body_html: I reproduced the same code on 4 different computers (2 MAC, 2 Ubuntu) with GPU compatibility and CPU based on the same tensorflow version 'v1.2.0-5-g435cdfc', '1.2.1' and I still have this big difference ... I would just like to understand what's going on. With exactly the same code I don't have the same output's behavior ...
